data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Udhampur to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Udhampur, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Udhampur, Jammu and Kashmir, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,105 believers in Udhampur to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 6,105 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Udhampur.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Nai (Sikh traditions) people might believe through him.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Udhampur, Jammu and Kashmir, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Udhampur, Jammu and Kashmir, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary:
the county of Udhampur, Jammu and Kashmir, India has a population of 555,000.

We estimate Udhampur has 6,105 people who might know Jesus, 6,734 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 542,161 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Udhampur that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

location.name: Udhampur
location.people_groups_list: Gardi (Hindu traditions), Budhan (Hindu traditions), Rajput Halbani, Brahmin Dakaut
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gardi (Hindu traditions) (5,300), Budhan (Hindu traditions) (100), Rajput Halbani (47,000), Brahmin Dakaut (74,000)
